entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SuperPMI diffs output: add more metrics #73506
    8.0.0
  • SuperPMI diffs output: split throughput diff by type #73505
    8.0.0
  • Assert in SigPointer::GetTypeHandleThrowing #73503
  • Marshaller for treating char array as null-terminated string in source generation #73501
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json support for Int128 and UInt128 #73500
  • SafeHandle marshalling improvements in the source-generated marshalling #73496
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] AOT compilation failing for System.Private.CoreLib in System.Runtime.Tests #73474
    7.0.0
  • Add ability to trim DtdParser when using default XmlReader settings #73465
  • RegionInfo.CurrentRegion.ISOCurrencySymbol returns XDR on iOS device #73464
    8.0.0
  • Package compatibility check target fails to parse #73463
  • [Mono] Add SIMD support for System.Numerics.Vector2 on Arm64 #73462
    8.0.0
  • UriBuilder creates Uri with wrong scheme if scheme has only one letter #73459
  • How delete entry from Tar archive? #73458
  • Incorrect nullable annotations on most MemoryExtensions methods #73457
    7.0.0
  • Crash - JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/BenchmarksGame/binarytrees/binarytrees-5/binarytrees-5.sh #73455
  • SIMD problems when mixing llvm and non-llvm code #73454
    8.0.0
  • `Internal CLR error. (0x80131506)` in `System.Reflection.InvokeInterpreted.Tests` on `coreclr windows x64 Release` #73453
  • Long running test: SendMailAsync_CanBeCanceled_CancellationToken #73447
    7.0.0
  • Tar crashes on reading the specific file #73440
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAot] Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.EventSource.Tests failure #73438
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: architecture definitions for RISC-V ISA #73437
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console failures #73436
    7.0.0
  • `System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.Tests` failing with NRE in `S.T.Tasks.ConcurrentExclusiveSchedulerPair.ProcessConcurrentTasks` #73433
  • Annotate System.Security.Cryptography.Xml for trimming #73432
  • Get System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration tests running with NativeAot #73431
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] reintroduce the use of personality routines in PInvoke stubs #73429
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAot] Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Tests.HostFactoryResolverTests #73420
    Future
  • placement new does not return aligned data in/near GetStackingAllocator() #73418
    8.0.0

Closed

  • superpmi: Add SuperPMI asm diff CI job #13319
    Future
  • Clarify desired platform attributes on Process types #68729
    7.0.0
  • AV x64 dotnet.exe on windows arm64 #72284
    7.0.0
  • Regressions from "Reimplement stubs to improve performance" #66997
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.Perf_AsyncMethods #70842
    7.0.0
  • Performance regressions due to GC Regions #63930
    7.0.0
  • Container Runtime Performance Metrics #52351
    7.0.0
  • Strange discrepancies between char[] and string marshaling #69809
    7.0.0
  • Test failure SampleSynthesisTests.SynthesizeRecognizeTests.SpeechSynthesizerToSpeechRecognitionEngine #58704
    Future
  • Support for TypeLibs needed for assembly consumption as VBA references #3740
    7.0.0
  • LibraryImport generated code feedback #69608
    7.0.0
  • C++/CLR IJwhost.dll Exception on windows server 2012 (works on Win 10) #71812
    Future
  • .NET not properly shut down when using a mixed-mode assembly in a native process #72610
  • string.Split not working as expected when using multiple string separators and StringSplitOptions.TrimEntries #73194
    7.0.0
  • Examine JsonSerializer behavior for ref structs & pointers #34779
    7.0.0
  • net 5 Cannot read resources that depend on serialization #48159
    7.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Sampling thread requests resume for a thread with !(suspend_count > 0) #72857
    7.0.0
  • Port pcre2 regex tests #61893
    7.0.0
  • [iOS] System.Text.RegularExpressions.Unit.Tests build fails with CMake error #60115
    7.0.0
  • [Libraries][iOSSimulator] System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.Tests ValidAccessLevelCombinations UnauthorizedAccessException thrown #58367
    7.0.0
  • Build workload artifacts step failing in official builds #58561
    7.0.0
  • TaskExtensions.Unwrap threads going missing. #73390
  • LibraryImportGenerator.UnitTests failing regularly with FatalProtocolException #67508
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Changes at 12/7/2021 3:27:58 PM #63458
    7.0.0
  • System.Collections.IterateForEach<String>.SortedSet has regressed #65190
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in PerfLabTests.GetMember #65382
    7.0.0
  • [mono] iOS Simulator builds will pick up a system ICU in some circumstances #50365
    7.0.0
  • `sudo dotnet workload --help` segfaults on Apple M1 in .NET 7 Preview 6 #72308
    7.0.0
  • strange Constructor behavior under last version #73319
  • The default deserializer is not working properly #73470
  • HttpStress and SslStress Windows builds failing in dotnet-install #73154
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.ColdStartSerialization<SimpleStructWithProperties> #71392
    7.0.0
  • Socket.BeginConnect in .NET 6 throws an unobserved SocketException #61411
    7.0.0
  • const attribute of an instance of host_interface is ignored #73402
    7.0.0
  • WebSockets over HTTP/2 issues #72301
    7.0.0
  • placement new does not return properly aligned instance #73409
    7.0.0
  • [Mono] Add SIMD support for System.Numerics.Vector4 on Arm64 #69186
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAot] OverlappedTests.PropertyTest3 #73422
    Future
  • [NativeAot] ThreadPoolBoundHandle should throw for unmanaged arguments #73421
    Future
  • [wasm] WBT test failure - `SimpleSourceChangeRebuildTest.SimpleStringChangeInSource` #73419
    7.0.0
  • Consider caching Utf8JsonWriter and PooledByteBufferWriter on a thread static in JsonSerializer.Serialize #69889
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.* cancellation tests fail in CI #72818
  • breakpoint hit on razor view only if razor and code are in same page, but not with code-behind #56029
    7.0.0
  • "CTRL+M" is captured as "Enter" in console app on Linux #73379
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests build failing with `Workload ID wasm-tools is not recognized` #73312
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Undefined behavior with null #73507
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [Mono] Fix Assert.Null failed for Mono in System.Reflection.Emit #73504
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Implement additional asymmetric signature and encryption overloads #73502
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Unix]: AcceptAsync with existing AcceptSocket support on Unix #73499
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Enable skipped System.Threading tests #73498
    area-System.Threading
  • Recoup some of the perf losses in cold start serialization #73497
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Fix nullable annotations on IEquatable/IComparable constraints #73495
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [mini] Fix the bounds check in GET_BBLOCK #73493
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] Remove active issues for https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/57506 #73492
    area-System.Security
  • Avoid accounting work on 32-bit platforms #73491
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Adding cultureName to GeneratedRegexAttribute #73490
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [Android][iOS] Remove BROKEN_CLOCK_SOURCE define on Android and iOS #73489
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Vectorize IndexOfAnyExcept<T>(T value) #73488
    area-System.Memory, 7.0.0
  • [Android] Enable ThreadPoolCanPickUpOneOrMoreWorkItemsWhenThreadIsAvailable test #73487
    area-System.Threading
  • [Android] Enable Dop_WorkersCreatedRespectingLimitAndTaskScheduler_Sync test #73486
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • [wasm] asset loading for workers #73484
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Fix aka.ms links in build promotion for VSDROP #73483
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • port SpanHelpers.IndexOfAny(ref byte, byte, byte, byte, int) to Vector128/256 #73481
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Don't memset memory in increments lower than word size #73480
    area-GC-mono
  • Use the scoped keyword in LibraryImportGenerator #73479
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Update PipeReader.ReadAtLeastAsync doc with AdvanceTo interaction #73478
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Disable GetGCMemoryInfo on arm #73477
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Port SpanHelpers.SequenceCompareTo(ref byte, int, ref byte, int) to Vector128/256 #73475
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Port IndexOfAny(ref char, char[1-5], int) to Vector128/256 #73469
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] just fix the crypto logging #73468
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Update for recent compiler changes for ref fields #73466
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Handle http version > 3.0 #73461
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Add unit test for HTTP3 trailing headers. #73460
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono][jit] box+callvirt optimization #73456
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • #60562 enable datetimeoffsettests #73450
  • Add custom JsonConverter for BinaryData that converts to Base64 string #73448
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Temporarily disable the KerberosExecutor tests on ARM32 to unblock CI #73445
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Map USER_CANCELED to AuthenticationException #73444
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [NativeAot] Triage another 14 libs tests #73442
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [WIP] Add support in yml for detecting darc dependency changes in `eng/Version.Details.xml` #73435
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • make SIP not on by default #73434
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Trigger all the AOT library tests when relevant paths have #73425
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Fix __SOFTFP__ case for arm getcontext #73449
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Ensure prerequisites are installed on the perf pipeline #72431
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Simplify initialization of CILJit singleton #73471
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Mark Process.PrivilegedProcessorTime as supported on MacCatalyst #73482
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • [NativeAOT] Enable async runtime suspension and return hijacking on unix-arm64 #73216
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix undefined behavior found with g++-12 ubsan #73424
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add missing Component Governance registrations #73485
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Fix string.Split handling of trimming with no replacements #73234
    area-System.Runtime
  • Misc createdump fixes #73426
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add innerException to ResourceReader FileNotFoundException #72957
    area-System.Resources
  • [wasm-mt] Remove two-phase suspend; fix state transitions in DS server; fix merge #73305
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • Adding PCRE2 tests to increase Regex code coverage #73323
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Stop including runtime-specific symbols in non-runtime-specific packages #73428
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Error if homebrew ICU is in LDFLAGS on iOS/tvOS #73467
    area-Build-mono
  • Revert "port SpanHelpers.IndexOfAny(ref byte, byte, byte, int) to Vector128/256" #73476
    area-System.Memory
  • port SpanHelpers.IndexOfAny(ref byte, byte, byte, int) to Vector128/256 #73384
    area-System.Memory
  • [iOS] Reenable skipped StructureToPtr tests #73236
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Disable SendMailAsync_CanBeCanceled_CancellationToken for more runs #73452
    area-System.Net
  • Provide a code-fix to add missing stateful marshaller shape methods #73186
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Do not throw ObjectDisposeException from Socket.EndXyz methods #73335
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Ensure correct alignment of CILJit singleton #73451
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add missing const qualifier to hosting API implementation #73404
    area-Host, 7.0.0
  • Fix sending end stream in http2 web socket stream #73222
    bug, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update global.json default and Version of dotnet used to test net7 Maui #73171
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Vectorize Convert.ToBase64CharArray and TryToBase64Chars #73320
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • port SpanHelpers.IndexOf(ref char, char, int) to Vector128/256 #73368
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance
  • Fixes for Overlapped tests #73439
    area-System.Threading
  • Disambiguate calli thunks based on full calling conventions #73359
  • [release/6.0][mono] add 400 band workloads #72379
  • Documenting providing websocket upgrade response #73296
    documentation, area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • `runtime-wasm-perf`: add support for running against forks, and branches #73105
    arch-wasm, tenet-performance, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Skip Manual_CertificateOnlySentWhenValid_Success for WinHttpHandler #73378
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Disable System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamConformanceTests.Parallel_ReadWriteMultipleStreamsConcurrently #73446
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Replace BUILDING_INBOX_LIBRARY conditional with NETCOREAPP #73443
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • MonoAOTCompiler.cs: fix regression in caching, which breaks incremental #73427
    area-Build-mono
  • Implement thread-local caching for Utf8JsonWriter in JsonSerializer. #73338
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Allow trimming away `ScopedRefAttribute`. #72814
    linkable-framework, community-contribution
  • Wasm.Build.Tests: re-enable building with latest sdk #73423
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • [NativeAot] Bring up a dozen or so libraries tests #73363
    area-Meta
  • [NativeAot] Start running 8 more libs tests #73283
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update Arcade + Workloads #72947

Updated

  • `runtime-staging`: Enable failed tests on stable jobs to fail the job #73400
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • COSE: Add documentation and exception correction #73394
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Enable JitDisasm in Release #73365
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • DCS alignment to 4.8 with schema support #71752
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Refactor wasmappbuilder's System.Text.Json reference to use a versions.props property #70582
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add new version of the ContentionStart event #72627
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix issue where calculation of valuetypeshapecharacteristic on Arm64 does not match native runtime #73406
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Optimize DateTime.Year/.DayOfYear properties; fix comments #73277
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add Directory.CreateTempSubdirectory #73408
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix ThreadAbort on Unix and reenable the related tests #73399
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Update runtime repo to use Preview 6 SDK #72145
  • Add missing tests for NamedPipes #72956
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Use `GetTempPath2W` if available. #72452
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • PlatformNotSupportedException for UNIX domain sockets on iOS/tvOS #73374

    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0

    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add lowering support for conditional nodes #71705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Added DEBUG switches for roundtrip ILASM #72128
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Mark phase prefetching. #73375
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Clean up AOT publish process #73416
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reduce contention for Datacontract Serialization #70668
    area-Serialization
  • [release/6.0] Backport edge case fixes to XxHash32/XxHash64 #73203
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 6.0.9
  • [wasm] Unmanaged structs are considered blittable if module has `DisableRuntimeMarshallingAttribute` #73310
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, 7.0.0
  • [debugger] First draft of managed debugger on wasi #67272
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Set up `HttpClient` for `ClientWebSocket.ConnectAsync` #73387
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • [Mono] Enable X86Base.Pause test only when LLVM is enabled #73318
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Linker to NativeAOT sync #73380
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Port Windows/MSDTC distributed transactions support #72051
    area-System.Transactions
  • Honor naming policy for string enum deserialization #73348
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Fix SerialPort memory leak when requests time out and no data is received #68014
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Apply some obvious rich debug info optimizations #73373
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Update javascript API usage in samples and tests #73367
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Improve XmlDictionaryWriter UTF8 encoding performance #73336
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Improve idle timeout tests #73228
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Process incoming frames before sending frames for Http2Connection. #73307
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Tar: restore directory permissions while extracting. #72078
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Unix: Move 'FileNotFound to DirectoryNotFound' handling to GetExceptionForIoErrno. #70661
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [wasm] SIMD support improvements #73289
  • Remove [Serializable] from OptionException #73316
    arch-wasm, area-Host, 7.0.0
  • Do not check object references for equality after hot reload #73009

  • [MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component #71203

  • Add null checks in various XML methods #73243
    area-System.Xml
  • X509Certificates.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #70821
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Initialize Generation Aware Analysis later #70764
    area-GC-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-05
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Disambiguate CalliMarshallingMethodThunk based on modopts #153

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fixed indexing error #1951
  • Fix Standalone template's official build and publishing #1953
  • Fixing Internal pool names in yaml to unblock official build #1952

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to get the assemblies imported by a FrameworkReference programmatically? #27008

Closed

  • `dotnet build` CLI issue with `-v:n -bl` in .NET 7 RC 1 builds #26965
  • Regression: `Workload ID wasm-tools is not recognized.` #26967

PullRequests

Created

  • Target net7.0 in additional projects #27012
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix print download link bug #27011
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Trim response file lines to prevent forwarding along whitespace-only tokens #26627
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix StatInterop to include new signature #26916
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update CODEOWNERS for dotnet new related code #27001
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Migrate dotnet new Cli, dotnet-new3, *.IntegrationTests, *.UnitTests, template_feed to SDK #26521
    Area-Templates

Updated

  • Enable nullable for the mapper types and code clean-up #26989
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Update the method for removing periods #26977
  • [Blazor] Update SDK to account for the crypto worker file #26966
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26991
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add rule for detecting attribute differences #26891
    Area-ApiCompat

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-05
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354
    Working Set

PullRequests

Updated

  • Syntax changes to support 'scoped' #6338

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide easy way to opt out of 'implicit usings' #63239
  • Simplification of `default(T)` argument should add argument name #63238
  • FindAllReferences cache does not get cleared when closing/opening a solution #63234
  • Inheritance Margin throws `StreamJsonRpc.RemoteInvocationException`, saying the source files are not included in the solution if they are generated by source generators #63232
  • Incorrect overload visible for Analyzer in OparationAction for Interpolated string handler #63231
  • Does not support unicode greater than 9999 in a regular expression #63228
  • Additional tab white space on XML comment leading trivia if Attribute is added prior #63227

Closed

  • Why can't use the same name for Nullable Type #63240
  • Compiler asserting in CSharpSemanticModel.GetImportScopesCore #62227
    17.4
  • StreamJsonRpc.RemoteInvocationException in VS 17.4 preview 2 when editing C# #63235
  • Assertion in CSharpSemanticModel.GetImportScopesCore fails in Interactive Window #63144
  • Ref field declarations should require runtime feature #62919
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Change the renamer benchmark to rename SyntaxNode #63246
    Area-IDE
  • Move options subsystem over to using SolutionService snapshots. #63245
    Area-IDE
  • Mark shipped APIs #63244
    Area-Infrastructure, api-approved
  • create regular PRs for main-vs-deps insertion #63243
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make SolutionServices (and related) APIs public #63241
    Area-IDE
  • Make bootstrap failures easier to debug #63236
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.4-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #63226
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63242
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Use syntaxkinds pattern in more places #63168
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Todo settings #63218
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove bogus assert around C# import scopes. #63146
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Remove one of our out of proc analyzers #63180
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Disable flakey tests #63175
    Area-IDE, Next
  • New hot reload interfaces #60219
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63237
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63233
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Ref fields feature requires ByRefFields runtime flag #62941
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63229
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Enable source build for ASP.NET external access project #62956
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Allow Roslyn to access any evaluation properties #62445
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63247
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add support for incremental analysis for method body editing scenario… #63130
    Area-Analyzers
  • Structural Error Cases for Lambda Default Parameters #62958
    Area-Compilers
  • Additional filter texts #63217
    Area-IDE
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Ban api #62921
    Area-IDE
  • Partition helix test runs using historical execution time data #62138
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove one of our out of proc analyzers. #63183
    Area-IDE
  • Handle `[UnscopedRef] scoped` in source and metadata #63134
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Disallow using ScopedRef in source #63046
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Auto-default ref fields with a null ref-assignment #63065
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid having to take locks repeatedly when cleaning out workspace #62986
    Area-IDE
  • Consider types with ref fields as managed #63209
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
